mapper.sql: news_id, keyword, stu_id, news_img, comment_num, praise_num, browse_num, create_time
mapper.select:
select
,
from news order by news_id DESC limit 1

select
,
from news order by news_id DESC limit #{start},10

select
,
from news where keyword = #{keyword} order by news_id DESC limit #{start},10
mapper.insert:
insert into news
news_id,
keyword,
stu_id,
news_img,
comment_num,
praise_num,
browse_num,
create_time,
news_cont,

mapper.update:
update news
keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=CHAR},
news_img = #{newsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
praise_num = #{praiseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
browse_num = #{browseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
news_cont = #{newsCont,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where news_id = #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update news set keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=CHAR}, news_img = #{newsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, praise_num = #{praiseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, browse_num = #{browseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, news_cont = #{newsCont,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where news_id = #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update news set keyword = #{keyword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stu_id = #{stuId,jdbcType=CHAR}, news_img = #{newsImg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, praise_num = #{praiseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, browse_num = #{browseNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where news_id = #{newsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
